title: Kindred Fan Art

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I drew Kindred! It honestly looks better on paper... But I don't have any programs for digital art or anything, so I'm stuck using paper, markers and taking a picture of it on my phone... lol This is only my third time using color on a drawing... (I prefer black and white drawings) So I'm still trying to get a hang of it.

replies.body:
I too prefer black and white. I'm just now getting more into colored stuff.

I love lamb! She's my favorite part! One suggestion about Wolf would to not have him being seen directly from the exact side. Some angle would help a lot!

That's awesome!

Yeah, I loved how Lamb came out. I was pretty disappointed with how Wolf came out. I totally agree that I should've added more depth onto him.

hello stone i am somestones and i approve of your artwork 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Hello Somestones! Glad you like it!
I'm actually a Taliyah OTP. Lol But if he/she mains Malph, that'd be pretty lit.
tfw you think you're good at art then you see this and you cry because the art is so good

I might just be blind af, but I really didn't see Wolf at all at first.  I processed him as some rock/stone in the background.

Again, I may just have been blind, but it may still be worth it to put him against something with greater contrast (especially the wispy part, it just makes it blend for me).
Yeah I agree, the physical drawing of this, he seems to show better, it could be because of the lighting, but I totally agree with ya. Thanks!
